Nunca o velho Ben-Ben Franklins (Dinheiro)
Grandes anéis (Ooh), champanhe (Champagne)

Mas em vez disso, eu tô pensando no trap (Pensando no trap)
Pote tão grande, chame de Super Bowl (Super Bowl)
Super Bowl, chamo as putas (Brr), entro no Rolls (Skrrt)
Estilo de vida no piso superior (Topo), Huncho e Post (Yeah, ayy)
Malone (Ayy), eu preciso tocar no meu telefone (Ayy)
Você sabe o que eu tô fazendo (Ayy), Huncho Houdini se foi (Ayy)

Minha mãe ligou, vi você na TV, filho
Disse que a merda mudou desde que começamos
Eu sonhei com tudo desde que eu era jovem

Agora eles sempre dizem: "Parabéns" (Ayy, uh, uh, uh)

Yeah, nós conseguimos (Ayy)

Hey, hey, hey, hey
Hey, hey, hey, hey

title: Post_Malone_Congratulations_9
lyrics:
It's Seiji baby
Have a long scope
Look like a dick on my Glock (Hahaha)

Got that chop, got that stick, bitch, I'm Trapanese
Ramen noodles on my dick when I'm clapping cheeks
Going stupid in the whip 'cause I cannot see
Tryna bring your dog, then you better bring that cutlery
Getting to the chips, hunnids blue, like Doraemon
Nice guy, but I spit flames like I'm Iroh
Talking out your neck, I bring the drum, taiko
Lames get to speaking, then what's up, bitch? Ohayo (Ohayo)
I'm a fucking shogun
Fronted in my face, opposition, let me roll one
Always get the A-plus, bitch, I need more hun's
One less dog at the pound, 'cause I stole one
Man these suckas wanna test, but I'm Asian, so I pass
Bitch, I'm running up a check, I ain't never skipping class
If you talking out your neck, on my momma, it's a lash
If I become doctor, I ain't saving your ho ass (You doctor yet?)

Ayy, why your eyes like that?
Ain't no molly in my lean, bitch, I squint 'cause I'm a Jap
Visor bucket on my face, I don't fuck with fitted caps
All this money that I make, keep it hidden in a stack in my mattress
Add it like a master, math kid
Skinny, long, slick mustache, like a catfish
Finna go Godzilla, we gon' smash shit
Lil ricefield fuck with big rice paddy, we active

She a hourglass, like the village of the sand
Made a bitch fall in love, now she tryna hold my hand
I ain't trippin' off these thots, all I'm thinking 'bout is bands
On some Caitlyn Jenner shit, bitch, I'm feeling like the man
Dirty comin' out yo' mouth, bitch, it's good we go toe to toe
Dirty snow bunny, bitch, you lookin' like Post Malone
Congratulations, you won gold for the brokest ho
I'm getting the guap, pockets fat like Totoro
Fuck a bitch to sleep, then I cut, like I'm killer bee
Made her hella mad, you can bet she still into me
On my A-game, I get killed if I get a B
Want the sushi roll, nah bitch, you can't get the D
Shawty think I love her, but I'm on to the next
Now she tellin' big tales, Tyrannosaurus rex
That ho be textin' me, she just askin' me for sex, so I fuck her from behind like a thousand years of death (Thousand years of death)

Like a thousand years of death
One thousand years of death
